rules.natural: If the river area has flood risk, then the water level is high in the river area.
Either the river area has flood risk or the ecosystem is in normal conditions.
Either conservation measures have been implemented or, if there is water shortage in the region, then the region is not in a drought condition.
Whenever funding is secured for the research project, then conservation measures are not implemented.
If a flood warning is issued for the region, then the vegetation is submerged in the wetland.
Under the condition that research on the ecosystem study is complete, then if the water level is high in the river area, a flood warning is issued for the region.
Either the sensors are functional equipment or field work is not suspended for the research team.
The levee is breached at the river bank or an evacuation is ordered for the community.
In the event that an evacuation is ordered for the community, then the river area does not have flood risk.
Whenever the water level is high in the river area, it is not the case that the vegetation is submerged in the wetland.

If the governor is informed by the state office, then in case it is not that federal assistance is requested or if bridges need repairs then roads are not damaged infrastructure, state resources are mobilized.
The governor is informed by the state office or an emergency is declared in the region.

Provided that an emergency is declared in the region, then if it is not that federal assistance is requested or if bridges need repairs then roads are not damaged infrastructure, state resources are mobilized.
Assuming the research station is actively monitoring, then measurements are taken by water gauges.
Either the research station is actively monitoring or satellite imagery has been collected as data.

If satellite imagery has been collected as data, then provided that it is not that if the ecosystem is not in normal conditions then there is heavy rainfall in the region, the aquifer is not replenished with groundwater.

Whenever measurements are taken by water gauges, then if it is not the case that when the ecosystem is not in normal conditions then there is heavy rainfall in the region, the aquifer is not replenished with groundwater.
In the event that it is not the case that if the water level is high in the river area then the vegetation is submerged in the wetland, erosion occurs at the river bank.
Should it not be that if the water level is high in the river area then the vegetation is submerged in the wetland, then erosion does not occur at the river bank.

If it is not that disaster response is activated or emergency services are alerted or if the levee is breached at the river bank then the river area does not have flood risk, then roads have damaged infrastructure.

Provided that it is not the case that disaster response is activated or emergency services are alerted or if the levee is breached at the river bank then the river area does not have flood risk, then bridges need repairs.
In case it is not that if the ecosystem is not in normal conditions then there is heavy rainfall in the region, the aquifer is replenished with groundwater.
If research on the ecosystem study is not complete, then field work is suspended for the research team.
Whenever the ecosystem is not in normal conditions, then the region is in a drought condition.
Provided that the ecosystem is not in normal conditions, there is water shortage in the region.
Should the ecosystem not be in normal conditions, then there is not heavy rainfall in the region.
